descriptive and narrative are good if you have a lot of content  but u need a lot of good descriptors and flow to the story
so ur lang need to be good
descriptive writing is easy to score in
argumentative dont have to use news per se  hypotheticals work as well (though ofc using news would be good)  also dont rly hae to use current affairs  i think relevant example are good enough
So   are you planning to write descriptive ones ?
Do you know the format for it ?
My school trains is argumentative  so I donâ€™t anything about descriptive

honestly none of them are easier than the other  best is to train n practice for all   in the case ur banking for descriptive essay but then they come up with some confusing ass thing to describe also difficult

uh i think the format is more flexible. for example  last year O level section C tested smth along the lines of  what youâ€™d do to de stress? i j wrote an intro and 3 different activities  then conclusion. actually a lot like argumentative except itâ€™s less dependent on hardcore longing :)

Hi everyone  can you guys help give me a letter grade (A+  B-  etc) for this introduction? I'm struggling to pass but I've been working on introductions. Would really appreciate the feedback. TIA! ^_^Question: "Can fear be good?" Discuss.For many people  whenever the word â€˜fearâ€™ is mentioned  they would think of something supernatural that they are scared of. Most would think that fear is bad. They may think that way because fear makes them open to peopleâ€™s judgement or criticism. However  fear can be positive. The positivity of fear can help a person to progress and grow into someone better.
that's a very big assumption in the first sentence
Oh. Thanks for your reply. Could you share how I could improve it?
dont associate fear with supernatural immediately
because most people donâ€™t necessarily think of the supernatural
I see. What's a better association?
you could improve it by just associating it with the idea of being scared
or you could do a rhetoric
asking the reader what their fears are
and then elaborating on your own
then u could go into the general idea of fear
Wow thanks! Can I check if you mean this would be in the introduction or do you mean in the body?

i think the introduction should mainly be your thesis/stance + a hook if you wish  but i think what fear means to you/what fear is defined as should also be in the introduction  but briefly  since the question is whether fear can be good
Right... I get it now. Thanks for your time and help! ^_^
